meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I can keep up in this major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Alexa, a third-year Political Science major. I’ve taken a bunch of political and social science courses lately and I’m really enjoying them, but I’m also feeling a lot more interested in business and humanities than I was before. I’ve always been interested in politics, but I never thought I’d be in a major that would involve so much of it. I’m majoring because I think it’s a good fit for my interests, but I’m also starting to feel like I’m not doing well in the classes and I don’t know if I can keep up. I want some help understanding what I’m doing well in and what areas need work, and I’m open to any advice or strategies.
